thread.title: What! Mick Jagger denies attending Oscars with Priyanka Chopra
thread.title_full: What! Mick Jagger denies attending Oscars with Priyanka Chopra

author: India TV Entertainment Desk
title: What! Mick Jagger denies attending Oscars with Priyanka Chopra
text:
What! Mick Jagger denies attending Oscars with Priyanka Chopra What! Mick Jagger denies attending Oscars with Priyanka Chopra Priyanka Chopra was all over the news yesterday when she announced her attendance at Oscars 2017 with Hollywood icon Mick Jagger. However, the legendary English singer has denied such claim totally, leaving Priyanka’s fans in India   Published on: 26 Feb 2017, 16:01:32] Mick Jagger Priyanka Chopra was all over the news yesterday when she announced her attendance at Oscars 2017 with Hollywood icon Mick Jagger. However, the legendary English singer has denied such claim totally, leaving Priyanka’s fans in mere shock. 
Mick recently said that he will not will not attend the 89th Academy Awards, let alone go to the prestigious event with our very own Desi girl Priyanka. 
On Saturday, Priyanka posted a selfie with the singer on Instagram and wrote about gearing up for the Academy Awards, which will be held here on Sunday. A post shared by Priyanka Chopra (@priyankachopra) on Feb 24, 2017 at 6:24pm PST 
It didn't take long for some people to speculate that Jagger will attend the Oscars with Priyanka. 
Jagger later tweeted: "How odd, I read that I'm going to the Oscars with Priyanka Chopra. I shall not be going to the Oscars at all." How odd, I read that I'm going to the Oscars with Priyanka Chopra. I shall not be going to the Oscars at all... — Mick Jagger (@MickJagger) February 25, 2017 
Priyanka had earlier announced that she will be attending the Academy Awards. She posted: "Change of plans! Oscars here we come. Mick Jagger LA LA Land." 
The actress, who got fame in the West for playing Alex Parrish in the US TV thriller series "Quantico", was one of the presenters at the Academy Awards last year. 
(With IANS Inputs)
